Step: Preprocessing

step_preprocess.Rd

Preprocess the experiment using glyclean::auto_clean().

Usage

step_preprocess()

Value

A glysmith_step object.

Examples

step_preprocess()
#> $id
#> [1] "preprocessing"
#> 
#> $label
#> [1] "Preprocessing"
#> 
#> $run
#> function (ctx) 
#> {

#>         ctx$dots, "group_col")
#>     ctx
#> }
